      • TRASH_PATH

        public static final java.nio.file.Path TRASH_PATH

      • oneTimeTestSubdirectory

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String oneTimeTestSubdirectory
        An optional path-component for the directory where test-results are written.

        See the --one-time-directory command line option in TestCommand where this is used to give each parallel buck processes a unique test-results-directory thereby stopping the parallel processes from interfering with each others results.

        TODO(#4473736) Create a long-term non-hacky solution to this problem!
